abstract: While the incandescent light bulb has dominated the global lighting market for more than 130 years, environmental concerns about efficiency are spelling an end to that era, and investors and executives see LEDs as the future of the industry, Reuters writes.

lead_paragraph: From Poornima Gupta writing for Reuters:
